newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Southcorp confirms A$35 mln upgrade.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Southcorp confirms A$35 mln upgrade.

text.p: Wine and appliance maker Southcorp Holdings Ltd on Friday confirmed it planned a A$35 million upgrade of two of its wineries.
Southcorp told Reuters in an interview earlier on Friday that it would investment A$35 million over three years at Southcorp Wineries in Barossa Valley and Victoria.

Southcorp said the upgrade would be staggered over three years to ensure the increase matched the growth in grape supply, The upgrade would lift Southcorp's bottling capacity at these two key wineries by almost 86 per cent, the company said.
By 12.15 p.m. (0115 GMT), Southcorp shares were three cents higher at A$3.80 on turnover of 3.8 million shares.
